docs.lead_paragraph: THE baby lies in an incubator, its body hooked up to machines. A thermometer taped to its skin records its temperature. A feeding tube runs down one nostril. Another line is linked to a device that will alert the staff if the infant stops breathing.

headline.main: The Heroin Babies: Going Cold Turkey At Birth; The heroin babies

docs.abstract: Author S Burnham article on increase in number of addicted babies being born to drug addicted mothers
docs.snippet: THE baby lies in an incubator, its body hooked up to machines. A thermometer taped to its skin records its temperature. A feeding tube runs down one nostril. Another line is linked to a device that will alert the staff if the infant stops breathing.
